Reviews.Title: “A Unique and Wonderful Experience”

Reviews.Content: admit 2night stay unplanned little story husband arrived amsterdam day 2012 discovered highly rated bb booked months prior complete utter disaster story review enduring dreadful night remembered brought july 2007 york times article amsterdam suggested stay immediately called reached thankfully guests checked invited barely midmorning close checkin time greeted warmly arrived flights stairs view apartment cleaned previous guests untidy seriously people slobs space fantastic realized hungry coffeebreakfast recommendation suggested screaming beans corner choice food excellent coffee returning suite hour walked magazine spread wont repeat reviewers rightly mentioned comfortable wellappointed space wish highlight white suite special 1 fantastic views windows day night 2 heated floors absolutely wonderful walking cold rain helped apartment incredibly cozy 3 location close wonderful restaurants bars excellent shopping ranging unique boutiques vintage 4 days experience amsterdam listened described offered spoton tips suggestions sad leave suites amsterdam hope return day

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful apartment in the best location in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: beafoulger
Reviews.Content: beautiful holiday experiences detail stayed white suite loved design views location super comfortable king size bed bed spacious gorgeous living gorgeous windows views keizersgracht kitchen table host home cooked dinner party 5 local friends night white suite clean details bang olufsen tv lovely ren bath products stayed chistmas temperature perfect heat easily quickly adjusted albert heijn supermarket literally 3 mins coffee bar door screaming beans wonderful restaurants bars choose thoughtful leave essentials kitchen tea sugar olive oil etc dont buy advantage able cook own meals gorgeous kitchen maybe am biased somehow understood beacuse am dutch originally amsterdam honestly dont gone website getting service hotel experience pretty getting exclusive apartment comments showers stairs steep youre netherlands stay home chain hotel dont experience cant handle quirks amsterdam special quaint city tall wide houses husband stay visit honestly wait return

Reviews.Title: “Quintessentially Dutch Experience”
Reviews.Author: GnT_xx
Reviews.Content: honest amsterdam try stay nine streets probably unique dutch experience amsterdam minus wind mill truely feels village restaurants bars markets atmosphere stayed white suite exceptionally accommodating loved extra charm offered awesome view suite leave
